content.detailedDescription:
chapter  1   
		seeing the ufo





	this will be a shorter version of what happened to us.  i will go into more detail later on.  everything that i am going to write actually happened.  it changed my life forever.  it was one of those events such as the kennedy assassination and the world trade center bombing that is etched in most brains.

	this event happened in 1964 on a late july weekday evening.  i was fourteen years old and dan lake was 13 years old.  the sun was just beginning to set in the western sky.  with all the air pollution of those days the sunset was usually a bright reddish color.  it was still bright enough to easily see.  the sky was perfectly clear on this beautiful day.  the temperature was about 75 degrees. 

	for the last couple of weeks dan and i would walk about a mile from our house  to the a and w root beer stand.  we called it the 
barrel because the roof was composed of a huge wooden, orange barrel after a day of playing baseball  we would buy a root beer and the best hotdogs i have ever had. 

	we would walk through the residential area and over the railroad tracks.  on north main street and adjacent to the root beer stand to the north was a nursery.  it is still there today.  we were about 30 yards behind the nursery in an open area heading east.  i looked behind me while we were walking to check out the gorgeous sunset. 

 
	it was at this time that i noticed to the west, but not directly toward the sunset a light blink.  the object was about 40 yards away.  it was about 25 degrees above the flat ground.  it was heading right for us at a very slow rate of speed.  the best way i could describe the speed of the object would be to straighten your arm out and spin in a circle, taking about ten to thirteen seconds to go one revolution.   so as you can see it was moving very slowly.

	it was also still way too early in the evening for any lightning bugs to be out.  they are usually lighting up much closer to dark.

	the light was a strange color.  i would describe the color as kind of a creamy green.  it wasn���t a bright green.  this attracted my attention because i had not seen this color in nature before this time.  i will describe more about the color and where it came from later.

	i should mention now that i was an eagle boy scout at that time.  we went camping in illinois almost every month.  the boy scouts went camping almost every month for many years.  we went camping for a week in upper michigan and canada every summer.  i went fishing approximately 20 times every summer at my grandparents place in southern illinois. 

	
	what i am trying to say is that i have been outdoors and in the woods all of my life.  this was definitely not a lightening bug or the synonym, a firefly.

	i do wear glasses, but i have perfect vision with the glasses.  dan lake has always had perfect vision.   


	after i saw this ufo i did extensive research for many years in the library.  there are very few bugs that are luminescent on land.  in the oceans there are more luminescent creatures deep under the sea.

	i talked to a couple of professors at northern illinois university about things that give off their own light.  they had never heard of such a thing that i described to them.  i also was feeling that they thought i was out of my mind.

	so because of the blinking and the color of  the light this object drew our undivided attention.  the ufo continued to head right for us.  my feeling at the time was not of fear, but curiosity.  i remember my saying to dan, ���what the hell is that?���


	the ufo was heading in a perfectly straight line towards us, again at about twenty-five degrees from the ground.  the blinking light was also very strange in an additional way.  this is one thing i have been a little bit unsure of over the years.  that was how often the ufo blinked.  it seems to me it was about every three seconds. 

	 i am 100% positive that the blinking cream green colored light blinked at the exact interval with every blink.  the duration of the blink was very short.  the light did not stay on very long.  i would estimate about one fourth of one second.   so it went on, then immediately off completely.  this is absolutely nothing like a lightening bug.

	dan lake and i stood facing the approaching object with dan at my immediate left.  we were now able to get a very close look at the very strange object.  the ufo came down to our immediate left.  it was still blinking at the same interval.  

	it leveled off at chest high level.  i am six feet tall and dan was about a foot shorter at that age.  it remained at this height the entire time it circled us.  there was no change in its height whatsoever.

	 the object was only three and a half feet from us.  it began to circle us in an absolute perfect circle.  the speed remained the same.  the height remained the same.  i am six feet tall and dan was about a foot shorter at that age.  the ufo continued to circle us over and over and over.  i can���t remember how many times it went around us.  the number of revolutions was quite high.  if i had to guess i would say 15 times. 

	i don���t remember us saying much, but my heart was really beating fast.  when dan gets excited his eyes open really wide.  they were really wide when i glanced at him.

	more about the ufo now.   i would estimate that it was about seven millimeters in diameter.  it was definitely not a centimeter in diameter.  i remember that is seemed to be perfectly round.  if it wasn���t perfectly round, it was very close to it.  

	the object was not spinning at all.  i am also positive about this.  when you are this close to an object you can see  details like this.  when not blinking i could not tell the any difference between the front part and the rear.

	the body of the object was a black in color.  the color did not change at all.  i also seem to remember the body being kind of segmented into four quarters.  the segmented part was very faint.  there were no distinct lines where the segmented part was visible.  

	where was the strange light coming from?  it was coming out of the back, bottom quarter of the object.  when the light was not blinking, that segment looked just like the other three segments in color and shape.  no light at all was visible when it wasn���t blinking.

	there were definitely no visible characteristics of life on the object.  there were no eyes, nose, ears, hair and legs.  there were definitely no wings of any kind.  

	there was no sign of any kind of propulsion coming from the ufo.  there was no air disturbance of any kind.  the object was completely silent.  there was no buzzing or humming.
content.summary: We saw a ufo about 5mm in diameter from 3 feet away.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a starboard deck of a cruise ship that was travelling in open sea westward, positioned south-southwest of key west fla. i was observing the stars in the northern skies as the sky was mainly clear with a few scattered clouds on the horizon.
i became intruiged with one particular object as it was definitely spherical and appeared to be situated between the scattered cloud cover and my line of sight. it's size was consistant with that of the stars, or perhaps a bit larger.
the object then began to spin in a pinwheel fashion for about 8-10 revolutions and then sped off at tremendous speed toward the northwest.
it spun very rapidly and with each revolution, it's area of circumference became larger. it was akin to watching water drain down a sink but only in reverse. i was able to observe the object as it sped off for approx. 1-2 seconds only due to the rate of speed. there was no sounds or any other anomolies associated with it. 
i found the experience to be rather eerie, but for some reason felt comfortable with it, almost to the point of satisfaction. i am an agnostic when it comes to aerial phenomena, however this sighting was definitely a mind stimulating experience.
content.summary: Spinning object spotted at sea

content.detailedDescription:
On friday april 4th, 2008 between 10pm and 10:30pm i was working in my home office with the tv on when i heard what sounded like a jet about to crash into the house.  the noise became louder and louder and eventually passed over the house.

our house is on the flight path for o'hare airport and we sometimes see light aircraft from a small local airport.  we are familiar with the sights and sounds of jets, helicopters, and light aircraft flying overhead.  this was louder and sounded like a jet was going to crash into the house.

later, my wife, who also heard the sound said that it woke our daughter up; who thought it was lightning and thunder although it was a perfectly clear beautiful night.

i peeked through the blinds of the office window to catch a glimpse of the jet to see if it was in trouble, but all i saw was a set of lights slowly traveling due east away from the house.  when i first caught site of it, it was about 100' away and 50' off the ground (much lower than any jet i've seen fly over our house on approach).  it appeared to be following the same flight path many other jets use to get to o'hare.

my eyes had not adjusted from the bright office lighting to the night, so i could not make out the shape of the aircraft other than the lights.
there were two white lights spread far apart (much farther apart than the runway lights on a typical jet, probably 200' apart).  they were far enough apart that i had to turn my head a little to focus on each one.

centered between the white lights was a large blinking red strobe (possibly on the underside of the craft).  the red strobe flashed about once per second.  as the craft traveled farther away, a second strobe began flashing on what might have been the top of the craft.  it flashed at about the same rate but was not synchronized with the other strobe.  i specifically looked for red and green strobes on the sides to get an idea of the wingspan, but did not see any.  after 10-20 seconds, the craft had drifted out of view (behind the houses in the foreground).

i am familiar with many aircraft that have passed over my house, but i did not recognize this one.  i thought it might be a b-2 stealth bomber but i have never seen one before except in pictures and i don't know what one would look like at night.  if it was a b-2, why would it be flying toward o'hare?

a few minutes later a passenger jet flew on a similar path but more to the south and much higher up.  by this time, my eyes were better adjusted.  the passenger jet's runway lights were much closer together than the other craft, the red and green strobes on the wings were visible, and you could hear the jet engine whine change frequency as the pilot reduced the throttle.  that's when i realized that the engine noise from the other craft didn't have any whine to it.  the other craft sounded like a jet at 50000' but hundreds of times louder even though it was moving relatively slowly.

more and more passenger jets continued to fly by (about one every five minutes - which is typical of heavy air traffic) but i had not noticed them earlier.  perhaps they were in a holding pattern until the other craft made its way through the night.
content.summary: Loud sound from low-flying craft with two white lights and two red strobes

content.detailedDescription: I am calling this an "unusual sighting", possible ufo-related.  on friday april 4, 2008, my friend and i were leaving hoover dam site and had just crossed into arizona on hwy 93 toward kingman.  about 20 miles into arizona i was adjusting ny seat and as i leaned forward i was compelled to look up and saw about 75 to 100 objects above the cirrus clouds.  as the clouds passed underneath the objects, they disappeared and then reappeared.  they disappeared in total and reappeared in total.  they were very large, and at about 25,000 to 30,000 ft altitude, they had to be at least 100 feet across, maybe more, each one.  they were about the same altitude as jets could fly.  this lasted from 3 to 5 minutes and when i had an opportunity to pull the car over and get a better look, they were gone.  the friend with me is a mufon field investigator and estimated along with me that the objects were at least 20,ooo to 30,000 ft overhead from my description.
content.summary: 75 to 100 objects appeared overhead, above cirrus clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Several weeks ago at the exact same time i witnessed what i believed to be a sattelite at this location. it was at a rest stop on i 95 where i work security. so, i decided to go out back at 2107 again last night and see if it passed ovewr again. sure enough at exactly 2107 it appeared again. only this time it did not appear from the horizon. it suddenly appeared directly overhead, as if decloaking. 
                         i watched it proceed south for about a minute. the one from several weeks ago moved from west to east. i gave three flashes three times with my mag light. at that time it appeared to slow almost to a stop and its light increased in intesity making it appear twice as big for about 5 seconds. 
                        then it continued to move south and after about 55 seconds simply vanished.It was high up like a sattelite. it was a solid white light and had no strobe lights at all. i dont know if it was signaling me or not when it increased in brightness. i plan to look again each night at 2107. to see which nights it appears. 
                               there are a large amount of chemtrails being sprayed in my area. especially each evening right before sundown. the red and white aircraft go over and leave their typical x patterns and tic tac toe patterns. this has given me respratory problems.
content.summary: Appeared similar to a satellite in  both movement and distance

content.detailedDescription:
Thats an awesome video.
i'm not trying to scare you but look at the sunroof in the beginning of the video.
is that an et on the roof looking in?
not sure but worth taking a closer look at.
heres a still of that.
content.summary: Guys who posted video from ca look at the sunroof in the beginning of the video

content.detailedDescription:
My friends were driving in rain n to san fran after we had been hanging out in industrial district la. they had just recently purchased canon g9. the link below is for the video. they asked me to report object because they are less familiar with subject. this video is the end of the incident. allegedly the object had already buzzed them, seemingly land and or stop extremely close to ground then buzz them again at such a low altitude that in the video object the appearance of what looks like oncoming headlights but is actually the object. it passes them and  case is able to follow with camera through passenger windows of suburu forrester so has good window views. then object passes them again mysteriously banking for the first time (strangely) during the whole incident. this object never banked during any of the maneuvers or landing according to both case and andrew. a car drives between them and object showing how low and close the object is. some evidence of hybrid antigrav/conventional flight characteristics, intial story told to me by witnesses suggests pure antigrav.

http://video.Google.Com/videoplay?Docid=2516411713694043799&q=burkeas&total=9&start=0&num=10&so=0&type=search&plindex=7 
http://www.Simmonsandburke.Com/
content.summary: Chevron or delta 3 glowing orbs silent at night extremely low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on 32nd street in joplin when i came to the stoplight at 32nd and rangeline. i was about the 4th car back . i sat there for only moments when i noticed a black disc about 15ft across hovering over 32nd street at a very low altitude (aprox. 150ft). i thought at first it was a balloon tied to the ground to promote the local radio station , but the closer i looked the more i began to realize it was too large. the wind was blowing about 35-40mph at that altitude for anything to be stationary . now this was a very sunny day with no clouds but there was no reflection of light from the sun beaming down on this disc. it was like it was absorbing the light instead of reflecting it. (even a black balloon reflects a little light) it began to wabble a bit and turned upright. the weird part of this sighting is that i looked around and there was only one other person that i could see that was watching this . everybody else did not even look up. when i drove by i looked  back and it was gone. i have also seen something of a bright light one other time that made no sound and did not react like a normal aircraft.
content.summary: Black disc with no light reflecting off of it

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from watching a friends band at 1:15am on 4/1/08 when i noticed something very unusual hovering in the sky. i was on a highway circling downtown tulsa right next to osu tulsa, where just to my north i saw three very bright lights. these lights were in the shape of a triangle and were hovering close to the ground. i was first amazed at the size of the lights and the perfect stillness.  i then tried to make since out of it. it was close enough that i should have been able to make out a body. i am used to seeing helicopters and planes fly over my neighborhood being close to the police station and a small airport. this ufo looked to big and still to be a helicopter or a plane, and there were no flashing lights anywhere. as i turned onto another highway the ll tisdale pkwy i continued to keep an eye on it. when i looked to the nw i noticed another object just like the 1st one, but this one was moving very slowly away from me and to the west. i watched it come to a complete stop and then move back the same direction from which it came. when i looked back for the other one it was gone. this 2nd one moved right by me and i tried to follow it but trees got in the way. after seeing these i cant stop looking at the sky. i got this weird feeling like they were scanning the ground, or mapping it out. i hope that someone else saw what i saw that night and made a report.  the only car i remember passing was a police officer that was parked in the center median of the ll tisdale and looking for speeding cars. i hope he saw the same things i saw and reported it.
content.summary: I saw two ufo's in tulsa 4/1/08 one was hovering in place and the other one was moving

content.detailedDescription: I didn't witness the actual "object," nor do i remember any aircraft in the area. i was about 4 hours from bogota,colombia, in a small mountain village calle villa de leyva. on one of our tours, we stopped to take some pictures by this lake. i didn't notice that there was an object until i actually looked at the picture months later. it's an object that seems to be hovering above the mountains behind me. upon seeing it for the first time in the photo, i felt that this was no airplane, helicopter, bird or spot on my lens. i was a bit surprised actually. most people that i show the photo to are like "wow...That looks like a ufo.." what do you think? some feedback? thanks for your time.
content.summary: Object behind me in photo above the mountains in the background.

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived at my aunt���s home on barnet st. in taylor, mi.  as i got out of the car, i looked up 88% angle to the east and i saw a bright, round object about 35,000 feet (or aircraft cruising height).  then four more objects, round but not as bright, joined the main larger object.  they made a perfect triangle shape and hovered.  objects break apart briefly, moved fast to the west and joined together in an upside down triangle as one hovered then moved slightly northwest, hovered and moved slowly back to the east.  two objects shot off at a very fast speed.  three stayed side by side, then another shot off.  only two remained; the large, bright object and the smaller duller on.  the large object pulsated.  it was very bright.  by this time, about 4:00 pm, i saw two jets approach out the northeast toward the objects, which, at that time, sped off at what i can only estimate at about 17,000 ��� 18,000 miles per hour and out of sight.  the jets then turned around and headed back to the northeast.  
        my brother, joe goforth, also witnessed the objects.
	this statement is true and accurate.
content.summary: Lights formed triangle and moved around to make other formations

content.detailedDescription:
A bright star like object appeared in the evening sky due north about 45 degrees up. it was brighter than any star and it appeared before any other stars were visible. it lasted for around 5 seconds and dimmed out. it did not move.
  we were sitting on the porch swing. my father and i noticed it at the exact same time and both remarked "look at that star!". i have never seen anything like that. i believe it may have been an exploding star. when night fell no stars were visible in the same area as where this star had appeared.
content.summary: Bright star appearance after sunset

content.detailedDescription:
This is a report for my friend who did not want to report this sighting.

we had lunch at the conway pub and eatery.  my friend stepped outside to smoke and wait by the truck, while i was finishing my meal and paying the bill.

when i reached the truck (across the street from the pub) my friend had a startled look and immediatly said "dude i just saw a ufo".

he described it as a dark (black) object, approx 300 feet in altitude, approx the size of a dime at arms length.  the object was traveling south to north for approx 1/4 to 1/2 mile, the angle above the horizon was approx 70 degrees (during the observed period) the object made a sharp turn to the east and shot away a tremendous speed.

my friend was quite disturbed about it and talked about it for at least the next 1/2 hour, he told me this has changed his life.

i have had my own sighting some years ago and did not doubt my friends report for even a second.
content.summary: Object appared made a turn and shot away

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking our dogs with my mother in the countryside not far from our home in penperlleni, south wales on 2/4/08 at 20:20pm. it was just starting to get dark and we saw what we initially thought was a really bright star,only then standing still looking at it we realised it was moving. it was bigger than the few other stars that were out and alot brighter. it was moving at a fast, steady pace at what looked to be at a high altitude. unlike shooting stars or comets it did not have a tail, it was very similar to a star only brighter. an aircraft was nearby this thing and looked like it was at the same altitude,this thing was bigger than that aircraft and faster. eventually after a couple of minutes it went into the clouds and was out of sight.
after speaking to a few people and watching videos on youtube.Com i thought it could be a satellite,althought i really have no idea what it was,and neither does my mother. i was pretty excited after seeing it but definetely felt on guard the rest of the way home. after seeing it there appeared to be alot of aircraft around that area although that could have easily just been a coincidence.
content.summary: Star like ufo seen in south wales

content.detailedDescription: It was between 1am and 1:15 am on the morning of april 7th, 2008. i was in my car driving around the neighborhood looking for my cat. i saw a red light about the size of two quarters behind the trees and it was movng. it pulsed. i was curious and followed it to get a closer look. it crossed over rt 309 over behind walmart and then i couldn't follow it anymore as the road ended and it eventually was out of site. it had a really bright big red light and some smaller white lights and some other colors - couldn't tell exactly what the other colors were as it moved quickly and the i lost site of it. it was pretty low as it appeared to be behind trees. the red light pulsed and the other lights twinkled and changed color rapidly.
content.summary: Big red light with small white and some other color seen moving across sky

content.detailedDescription: This is the first ive spoken of these events in over 15 years.  when these things were happening and i tried to tell people, they thought i was crazy and people started treating me differently.  im about may of 1988, i was going to pismo beach from the central valley in california.  it was late at night, i was tired and wanted to go to sleep.  so i pulled onto a road (bitterwater road) to take a nap.  a short time after stopping about 100 yards from the main highway, a circular golden/white light popped over the hill in front of me.  i thought it strange because it was so bright, and had it been later in the morning id of thought it was venus.  it took me a few hours to convince myself that it was remaining stationary over the hill and not moving with the background stars.  a little before dawn it started receding from me straight up at a fast pace.  when it was gone, i continued on to pismo but couldnt get the incident out of my head.  at the end of the weekend, i was driving back to the valley and decided to stop in the same place again.  shortly after i arrived the light appeared again.  i got out of my car, walked around a bit, then walked toward the highway when i noticed a second light around the hill behind me.  this second light was below the line of the hills (definately not a star) just hovering there.  after about an hour or so of watching these lights i decided to continue on home.  after turning back onto highway 41 and starting into the kettleman hills, i noticed a single light behind me the same color as the ones i had been observing, this was mainting a distance of a few hundred yards behind me and every once in a while it would disappear, at which point a car coming towards me would show up, pass me, get out of sight, then the light would reappear.  this continued the whole way through the kettleman hills till a few miles before i entered the valley.  for the next few years, i would return to the spot and almost allways saw something,  i even convinced two of my friends to go with me, one of them we didnt see anything when we went, the other though, got to see both the light that came up in front of me and the one that was around the hill behind us, he also got to see them follow us through the kettleman hills, afterwhich, i could never convince him to come with me again.  through the whole experience i was never afraid, more curious then anything.  i even tried reporting it to lemoore nas though they just called the police on me thinking i was psycho.  then one night i was feeling kind of down and went to one of my favorite spots to think.  it is a rock formation in the sequioa park with stairs cut into it and you can see the whole valley from the top.  as soon as i arrived i saw my lights in the sky, but there were more of them and not acting the same, i was afraid to go to the top of the rock, and shortly after decided to go home. the lights left me alone shortly after leaving that spot.  i made it almost all the way home but was still shaken up a bit so thought i would drive around a little longer.  i headed out to laton, not long after i drove through laton, i noticed one of the lights hanging over a field not far off the road.  i turned down the next road that went that direction (davis ave.) i had only gone about 100 yards down the road, the light was directly in front of me, all of a sudden a blinding light was shining on me and all of my muscles seemed to tighten up on me.  my next thought was that i had to get out of the car because a train was coming, i was very calm about this thought, and it didnt even register in my mind that i could not see.  things went blank again, then my next moment of conciousness was me being aware of being out of the car (though not being able to see still didnt register to my conciousness) then something sideswiped me almost taking my arm off.  things went blank again, and then i remember talking to someone (somehow i was aware of talking to the train conductor), and i remember talking to the police who were telling me since i was half way between fresno and hanford i could pick which hospital i wanted to go to (i told them hanford).  through this whole experience i was extremely calm till i got to the hospital, once in the hospital i was terrified for no apparant reason.  when i finally came to in the hospital, i found out that i had hit the embankment of rock that the train tracks rest on so hard that it had lifted the back end of the car onto the tracks, and a few hours later a train came along and wiped out my car.  my face had hit the steering wheel so hard that i broke my face and it had swelled up so bad i couldnt even open up my eyes, the train had sideswiped me on the way by and tore up my arm at the elbow.  after getting out of the hospital i went back to the site of the accident, there were houses on both sides of the tracks within about a hundred feet, and people were inside of both the houses, but noone heard a thing all night long.  i never told anyone about the events leading up to that night and i havent been back to bitterwater road or the sequioa forest since.
content.summary: A part of my life i tried to forget

content.detailedDescription:
'miniature u.F.O. in flight'

on saturday night april 5, 2008 around 1:30 a.M.
in burton michigan

k and c finished up our shopping at kroger 
in davison michigan. the following 
event took place while we were driving west on
davison road (near center road) toward k's house in 
flint. at approximately 1:30am, we passed by chase bank 
in burton and the both of us noticed something unusual 
flying in front of us. street lights lit up the area.
both of us agreed that the creature appeared to be 
flying 3 1/2 feet above the ground heading south.

c. was driving the vehicle. when she turned her head 
from glancing at the chase bank (on her left) 
to face the road,a flying creature appeared in 
her right peripheral vision. it moved very fast. 
c. quickly looked at the creature as it flew in 
the direction of the chase bank before disappearing. 
c. didn't notice any wings on the creature, but,
for a minute, she noticed a nearly 5 inch furry 
brown colored body for 2 seconds. then it turned
into a small 1 1/2 inch shape. the creature was 
flying horizontally before nose diving another 
1/2 foot towards the ground before reaching the 
other side of the road. then it disappeared.

k. was sitting in the passenger seat and
looking straight ahead when he noticed
the bizarre u.F.O. he caught a glimpse of
what appeared to be a cigarette butt thrown
from a window. but as k. followed it with his
eyes, he noticed it was too big to be a 
cigarette butt. it had the appearance of 
a bright orange christmas tree light or 
an orange globe. the size of it was  1 1/2
inches it appeared to be 3 1/2 feet 
off the ground. the creature moved perfectly
horizontally slightly rising by the time
it reached the middle of the road. it looked
like it slightly dipped maybe 1/2 foot 
before it reached the other side of the road.
when it reached the other side of the road
it was gone. it vanished.

k. and c. agreed the event lasted about 8 seconds
and the u.F.O. just a little bit faster then
a bird or a bat. they speculate that this may
have been a fairy experience.
content.summary: Miniature u.F.O. in flight... possible fairy experience observed by 2 people while driving

content.detailedDescription:
Witness called state director the day after the first group of sightings and gave a lengthy report. the state director and assistant state director went to the witnesses' house a few days later and interviewed witness, husband, son and daughter. her report follows: 

i had stepped outside on my deck of our house in town for a smoke. i always look up, hoping to see a ufo. suddenly i saw 3 lights in a triangle pattern which is a little wider than my hand at arm's length. they appeared to be hooked together, and i thought i could see a shadowy triangular shape with the lights at the corners. but they were moving too fast to be sure. the lights were round and not much smaller than the full moon. they were very pale amber in color and not very bright. they were going west to east and went across the sky in about 4 or 5 seconds. (group 1) 

i called my husband to come out and watch. he didn't see the group and was skeptical, offering other explanations. then we saw 5 lights in a v-shape come from the west to the east. the lights were similar to the first group in color and speed. (group 2) 

we called our son and daughter to watch. our son is a skeptical, logical type person and at first didn't believe us until another single light similar to the others came past. he tried to use binoculars but couldn't because it was traveling too fast. these groups and the next groups all had about 10 minutes in between them. (group 3)

then we saw another single light. (group 4)

then 5 or maybe 7 that flew together in a v formation, and then peeled off to the left and right. (group 5)

then 5 more in a line, one behind the other. (group 6) 

always after the lights we saw several planes in all directions around them. these planes were similar to what we see at other times, but it seemed notable because there were more of them. they were quite high, but we could see them because each one had a row of many lights, bright and flashing red and white, on each wing and on the front of the fuselage. from that we could tell the shape. the wings went crossways, not swept back.

next i saw a much larger plane with swept-back wings. it came right over our house, very low, and made a lot of noise. we thought it very strange for a plane so large to come that low. my husband drew a sketch of it, showing a round jet opening at the back.

our daughter described seeing the lights too, but her sketch is more like a circle with lights inside it. she isn't sure whether the lights were round or more like trails because it moved so fast. she saw 9 or 10 of these altogether. the descriptions are not exactly the same, but since the objects came and went so fast that doesn't surprise me too much.

i've always wanted to see a ufo. that's why i always look up when going outdoors. i'm very glad others corroborated my sighting so i know i'm not crazy.
*******************************
two weeks later, on march 28, about 8:30 p.M. we saw lots of planes going back and forth east and west. then at 9:11 we saw about 20 lights in a very wide v, not a perfect shape, sort of like a flock of geese, but moving much faster. 

at about 11 my husband saw a very bright light. it first appeared to be a moving star, then it suddenly expanded to about the size of a cantaloupe at arm's length, then it whished up and away very, very fast until lost to view.
i have included the statements written by my husband and son as attachments.
content.summary: Several groups of lights separated by about 10 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Back in either 1973 or 1975 (i am the world's worst on dates) i was driving across florida at about midnight. a ufo crossed the highway in a northerly direction.  it must have been about 30 feet in diameter.  i say diameter because it was "cigar shaped" as one would expect a round shape to look when seen on edge. it glowed with the same kelvin color as a cool flourscent light.  behind it was an air force jet chasing it.  the ufo was leaving it at a rapid rate. i would guess that it was traveling at three times the speed of the chase plane. 

they were so low that i could have read the numbers on the jet if it had been daylight and i had time. they weren't much above tree top level. 

i am very glad the jet was in the picture because it gave me a reference point to determine size and altitude. it all happened fast but i was a. not drinking, b. not sleepy, c. not prone to fantasy. 

i have a theory about why the government won't admit they are real.  imagine yourself as the head poobah of an island nation that is yet undiscovered.  you, your family and a priesthood are the one and only authorities.  your family has a monopoly on on the production of canoes, food, etc.  your hold on power is dependent on the population's awe of you and your power. 

reports from fisherment start coming in about huge ships they have seen in the distance. would you want the people to know about them and the fact that there is another great power out there? i don't think so.  

on two tv documentaries i have seen "insiders" say that their understanding of the government's reluctance to admit ufo's exist is the fear of what it might do to organized religion.  

feel free to distribute this anywhere you would like and to contact me.
content.summary: Ufo was headed north and crossing alligator alley

content.detailedDescription: Last night around between 730 and 8 me and a friend were walking and we noticed a white orb in the sky we attempted to take a pic but i toke off right as i toke the pic and it looked kinda weird then later when i got dark we saw another orb it was flashing red and white it looked like it was getting closer so we went inside the scariest thing is that i have now seen 3 ufos this month
content.summary: A white orb followed by white with flashing red orb 2 hrs later

content.detailedDescription: I am 52-years-old and have had several sightings since i was very young;i have been very apprehensive to discuss these with anyone due to ridicule.I feel that i'm old enough to share these experiences with someone like mufon who are willing to listen.I was raised a strict roman catholic with the idea that u.F.O.'s were nothing more than the imagination of science fiction writers.However,when i was 13-years-old,this notion was turned upside down.During the summer months i would sleep over my cousin christopher's house several times.My aunt and uncle were fun-loving people who catered to us with the idea of having the most summer fun.Chris's bedroom was located upstairs of their house.The house was located on the shore of little bay de noc in the city of escanaba,michigan;escanaba is an iron port town on the shores of lake michigan in michigan's upper peninsula.After wrestling around on his bed,we went to a cluster of windows that overlooked the lake.We noticed a bright light hovering motionless over a lighthouse that is about 5-nautical miles out over lake michigan on the bay of green bay.Thinking nothing of it,we went on with our play.After about 15-minutes or so we went back to look out over the lake.The light was still there in the exact position!For some strange reason,we were glued intently to this sight,almost hypmotized.After several minutes the light began to move very slowly and perfectly parallel to the water as if it were on a frozen straight line sideways.We watched it move very slowly and perfectly parallel to the water;no airplane that we had seen ever moved this way without rising or falling in it's tragectory.Finally it stopped at stonington point,a peninsula about 2 miles across the lake.Suddenly it began to move from west to east along the stonington peninsula until it was directly across the lake and directly behind the line of their house!It stayed motionless for several minutes and then began to appear larger,as if it were traveling on a path directly toward the house.For some strange reason we were completely enthralled by this event,even though neither one of us were interested in u.F.O.'s at that time.We quickly ran downstairs to tell my aunt and uncle that a strange light was heading toward the house.Amused by our excitement,they agreed to go outside to satisfy our whims.We watched in awe as the light approached the house...Not a word was spoken.The object came closer until it was directly over their house,moving no faster than a walking pace.As it passed over we could see the underside of the craft and it's complete shape.It was huge,maybe half the length and width of a football field.It was oval-shaped from front to back and squared-off flat at the rear.It was no higher than 200 feet above the ground and we could clearly see what is best described as "complex piping" on the under belly,similar to ships in a star wars movie!It traveled nearly in slow motion and made no sound at all.We staired at it as it traveled from south to north over the city of escanaba.The feeling i remember as it passed over is that all time stopped and we were in a mysterious state of suspended animation.For some odd reason,we walked back into the house and began watching t.V. as if nothing had happened!Nothing more was said about it.My aunt has since passed away.But my uncle still remembers that night, although he will never talk openly about it.I would be willing to take a polygraph test to prove that this story is true!
content.summary: Silent craft passed over my cousin's house w/ 4 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was walking into our bedroom to feed the baby and i was also talking on the phone to my mom.  i walked to the window (facing west)to shut the blind when i noticed a bright yellowish light in the southwestern sky. i was looking sort of catty-corned towards the missouri river.  i thought it was just an airplane at first, but it appeared to hover for around a minute.  i watched it a little longer, and it seemed to waver and quiver around, so i figured it was probably a planet, since i've seen venus appear to do similar things due to atmospheric distortion.  as i watched, the light sunk below the tree line, when this happened, i got off the phone in order to pay attention to this light better.  as i watched, i could see the light moving back and forth and up and down behind the trees, i'm not sure just how long i watched it do that, then the light emerged from the trees at about treetop level and started across the road and into the field, heading directly towards our house(the tree line is maybe about 300 yards from us).  the light appeared to be a diamond shape composed of 3 or 4 smaller yellowish lights, and there was no noise associated with it.  when i saw it start towards the house, i yelled and shut the blind as fast as i could.  my husband heard me yell, and asked what was going on.  i ran into the living room and told him what i saw, so we both went outside to look.  by the time we got outside, the light was gone.
content.summary: Bright yellowish light in sky hovered, moved behind trees and took off across field towards house

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on cr 72 toward auburn, al between cr 188 and cr 82 about 1:45 am one morning when i noticed off to my right and ahead of me up in the dark sky was an orange-reddish spherical glow.  the light stood out in the beautiful, clear night sky and grabbed my attention because of its illuminating light unparalleled in the night sky.  i could not gauge how high the object was above the trees but it had to be maybe at least a quarter or half mile high.  the object was a good mile or so from me or maybe even several miles away. i could not tell for sure, especially since it was over 2 years ago, although i remember the date and time of the event and the shape of the object like it appeared to me yesterday. i figured the light was maybe a star or something, yet the object could not have been the moon nor a star because the object was closer to the earth than a star or the moon would be... a lot closer.  not a second after i had noticed it, the stationary object immediately shot away leaving a streak of light as it flashed out of sight in the blackness of the sky.  this streak of light resembled the streak of light left by the millennium falcon as the spaceship sped into hyper drive in the movie star wars.  it all occurred so suddenly that i figured i saw a ufo because it was an object that i could not identify and it was hovering in one spot... flying... a ufo.  i am intently interested in the ufo phenomenon.  i had been studying and continue to this day to study the ufo phenomenon and read both fictional and non-fictional resources on the issue.  a friend riding with me at the time of the sighting was studying and did not notice it at all for the sighting was over almost before it began.  i have never seen anything like it before nor since.  the reason i am just now coming forward is that i had been debating whether to share this information.  also, i would like to know if there were any other sightings in the auburn area that fateful morning that may or may not be related to my own.  due to the abrupt sighting, no photo or video was taken of the event.
content.summary: Saw reddish-orange spherical glow up in night sky; larger light than moon or star or any other light  in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Unknown object appears on film 04.04.2008 over tallinn. direction flight from sw to ne
content.summary: Unknown ship over tallinn

content.detailedDescription: My brother inlaw and i were fishing on the san saba river in tx in the early morning houres 2-3 am of the early to mid 90s i can probley get a closer time frame if important.When we saw what at first we thought was a falling star when you first see them they seem to go slow then speed up. well this thing just kept going at the same pace across the sky it was about the size and shape of any other star just brighter like a satellite but i had never seen one at that time.I have now and know that what we saw was not a satellite.We watchd it for probley a min or so and then it seem to stop and change directions almost at the same time and them sped off at twice the speed it had been covering the sky till it went out of sight. as best as i can tell it came from the east going west turning southeast. i googled the river we were on and got a satellite photo of the area and figerd out which way it was going when i backd the image out it look like it might have been following i-20.That area down ther is know as an oil burner route for military plains infact we have seen many planes at treetop down there .This thing had no sound what so ever i don't know what the sr-71 would look like at 70,000 to 80,000' or if you would hear it .My wifes gradfather told me he walks with a retired policeman that described the same thing to him and for about the same time period and he was in san angelo tx at the time some sixty miles from mertzon.
content.summary: We thought it was a falling star or satellite but it change directions.And sped up

content.detailedDescription: I am writing for my son who is mentally retarded.He neither has the imagination nor does he have the knowledge of u.F.O's to create such an elaborate story,although he is high-functioning and very verbal.On the night in question,my wife and i had gone to bed at about 9:30 p.M. james wanted to watch a t.V. program,so we let him stay up later.He decided to goe to the kitchen to make a sandwich when he noticed a light descending from the southern sky and "float" above the trees located at the back of a field that is approximately 350 yards long.The object then slowly lowered to about 20-feet above the ground at the edge of the back field.Suddenly,the object moved very slowly in a direct path towards the house.He said that it was shaped like an ice cream cone and was glowing with a purple and white light with small lights that surrounded it.The object floated up to an area between our garage and apple tree and hovered there for a minute or two;the garage is approximately 25-yards from the back of the house.He said that he fealt a "tingling" vibration on his feet but did not hear any sound.The craft then slowly "floated" to an area between the garage and our water pump-house.It then hovered directly above the pump house for a couple minutes and then soared upwards and south-easterly at a tremendous speed until it was a dot in the sky and then completely vanished! we grilled him several times about this story but he never waivers,repeating the same story,over and over...And james only has the mental capacity to repeat what he saw!Is this unique that a mentally challenged person sees a u.F.O. with such fine detail of events? my wife and i completely believe him!
content.summary: Cone-shaped craft descended from sky and hovered in back of garage

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving along interstate 90 heading east and about 2-3 mile from the junction with route 59.  i noticed a large bright white light straight ahead of me.  it was much larger and brighter than a star or any airplane light i've ever seen.  i would estimate it was about 1/4 to 1/2 the size of the moon and clearly not a point of light.  as i watched, i noticed that there were three distinct, also white, lights along the "bottom" of this larger white light.  they were visible because they were clearly outlined somehow against the larger light background. as far as speed, these lights appeared to be hovering with no apparent motion.

then, suddenly, the lights were gone -- disappeared as i was watching.

i looked up again to see an entirely different configuration of bright lights, but still much more distinct than the lights of two airplanes (one to either side of these lights -- o'hare airport is not too many miles further away to the east).  these lights were "sideways" to me (in the sense that they eventually begin to move off toward the south very slowly).  the configuratin was three bright white lights in the form of a boomerang or triangle with the "point" to the south.  there were also two blinking red lights, one centered "between" the two white lights which were not the point of the triangle, and the other a definite distance back.  these lights did not change place in relation to each other, but remained in the same configuration.  after seeming to hover in one place, they begin to move slowly toward the south.

by this time i was approaching the merge onto route 59, which i have to take northward to go to my job in lake zurich, il.  as i arrived at the stop light at the intersection of the exit from i-90 and rt. 59, i looked up above the treeline across rt. 59 to the east and saw another? single large bright light again -- looking like the light i had first observed, but, due to position, it seemed to be more likely a different source.

windows of the car were up, and no sounds were heard; nor were there any other sensory perceptions beside the visual observations.

no shape or outline against the night sky was seen -- only the unusual and unusually bright lights and the strangeness of hovering or moving very slowly. "not like any airplane i've ever seen."  and impression was that the lights -- especially the boomerang/triangle array were "very large"

[note: the information above is attested to by the witness, connie kraft, and was recorded as above and verified as accurate according to the recollections of the witness at the conclusion of an interview the same afternoon as the event conducted by field investigator, frank coffman (11818)]
content.summary: Large bright white light, then showing three distinct lights within, disappeared, then triangle pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Bueno como todas la noche sali para la disco como donde vivo es plya y las disco quedan en la pura playa es un lugar perfecto so yo estaba en la disco bailando y queria ir al bano pero el bano del lugar estaba muy lleno so desidi salur a la playa sollega a un lugar oscurodebajo de una palmera y de repente senti que algo no estaba bieny estaba mirando lo que yosabia que era un u derepente mire a las montana   derepente me di cuenta que era eso so yo llame a un amigo que trabaja en el lugar estaba afuera recojiendo las botella y el es mas oy no mas lo mire pero tengo el presentimiento que lo bere denuevo so menos com yo el lo miro y dijo que si ufo pero despues siguio trabajando y yo me quede en el lugar mas omenos 15 a20 minutos y miraba como el objeto cambiaba de color como la estrella que siempre miro en las noches y derepente sefue desaparesiendo poco a poco fue detras de las montanas bueno estaremos en contacto y espero escuchar de ustedes sotengo el presentimiento que estare mirando otroalguno de estos dias bueno.
sergei
content.summary: Redondo con muchas luses al rededor y de a colores

content.detailedDescription:
This is a detailed report i also sent to ufocasebook.Com.


good day,

my father was on vacation in the south of france and just returned yesterday. knowing i had seen a ufo 6 weeks prior to this day and knowing the resulting enthusiasm and curiosity i had developed for the subject, he showed me two pictures he had taken the day before they returned.

my father wanted to take a picture of the sunset. both photographs were taken on route du grau de vendres in f-34350, vendres-plage in the south of france, in a north-western direction, with an interval of about 20 seconds. the first picture, taken at 20:50 local time, shows something out of the order. it was taken with the flash turned off. it is not the moon, obviously, and research conducted by myself has shown that on the day the photo was taken, 04/04/2008, the moon could only be seen as a very narrow crescent. it should be noted that the object itself was invisible to the naked eye and only showed on the camera. the second photo, taken by my father after he had seen the object on the camera's display, was taken at 20:51 local time, with the flash turned on. this time, there was nothing in the sky.

the camera my father used was a 7 megapixels pentax optio m20. the skies were clear in that region at that time, there were no clouds and it hadn't rained in five days. there are no streetlights in the area, so no reflection could have been caused on the camera's lense. no airplanes were visible in the area at that time. temperature was 15-16��� celsius (59-61��� fahrenheit).

it is not a comet as there is no tail visible, and if there were a tail it would mean that the object was heading straight for earth. it is obviously no conventional aircraft, a claim that my father should know to dismiss as he is an aerospace-enthousiast, although he has no formal training. it's equally hard to identify it as a ufo as it doesn't seem to have any of the characteristics of a conventional ufo. it is impossible to tell if the object was stationary as it only showed on the picture. what struck me personally is the aura around the object and the fact that you can find a smaller reflection of the object a bit to the upper right. could this mean that the object moved so fast or even "teleported" from one place to another?

it should also be noted that my father has been a police officer for 31 years this month and is a very down-to-earth sceptic.

my father has agreed to sign a form stating that what he has said in his testimony is true, that the photograph is unedited and has not been altered in any way.

thank you for your time

marvin
content.summary: Sighting over south of france

content.detailedDescription:
At 9.20 ish pm(gmt) i went outside to find something in 1.My car, and then 2.Across the street to my mother'car (if i found nothing in my car!).I was reaching in my car and a bright light moving caught my attention. i saw what i feel was the same object on friday eve and then it passed over at the average height of a plane (the same as sat night-but at slightly earlier time i am quite sure). on fri night what i saw i kind of said 'nah' to myself, although this was silent it did seem to waver/veer slightly left in it path. moved like a plane-glided- in air but was silent. it kind of headed e(ast)e(east)n(orth) friday(towards germany?) but this eve it was going due east. i guess it got almost above chepstow (or 4 miles away tops - maybe within 10,000feet?) i think much less than 10,000 feet - but i am not too clued up on objects and altitude.
i was watching unsuredly at this point.Within 10-15 seconds this thing moved off kind of ees direction at what seems 30-40 degrees. it did get smaller and within 5-10 secs got slightly light orange. it left sight!Simple as.
location - i believe the object was possible above the severn estuary/bristol channel- this i believe is as far south as it could be.
more likely above a line that would run in between the estuary/coastline and the m4 motorway. it was definately on an east bearing. probably took off approx  1mile west - sw of the town of chepstow.  
the object would have covered about 2 miles in a contant direction -(that i observed anyway). possibly 5-10 seconds after i affirmed with myself i was watching something unusual - i.E.As far as i could tell there was no structure(wings or rotor blades,etc) jutting off the object. i realised the light didn't seem to be focused in any one direction - it just emanated out --- well after the 5-10 secs the object moved away about 30-40 degrees upward and at a more southeasteast direction. it was gone within prob 8 secs. i watched it dissapear in a constant direction.
content.summary: Observed star-like light move across sky (<200mph?).Then leave atmosphere @ approx 30degrees.
